title: Tumid Lupus Erythematosus (TLE): a review of a rare variant of chronic Cutaneous Lupus Erythematosus (cCLE) with emphasis on differential diagnosis
content: Tumid Lupus Erythematosus has been the subject of heated debate as to its correct nosographic classification. In particular, its definition has changed over time, depending on the different studies performed. In this review we address the initial definition of TLE, the changes that have taken place in the understanding and placement within the classification of Lupus Erythematosus (LE), and focus on clinical, histopathological, immunophenotypical and differential diagnosis aspects.
